title: Why President Biden fired Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz from a federal fitness council

sentence: Topline Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker said Thursday he wont comply with President Joe Bidens request that he resign from the Presidents Council on Sports, Nutrition and Fitness, even though federal law dictates that the former football star step down from the role and the White House already named his replacement.
author: Derek Saul
title: Georgia Senate Candidate Herschel Walker Refuses To Resign From Presidential Council

sentence: The White House sent letters to Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker, telling them they would be fired if they did not resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness and Nutrition, a White House official said.
author: Rick Rouan
title: Biden asks GOP Senate candidates Mehmet Oz, Herschel Walker to resign from presidential board

sentence: A White House official told CNN Wednesday that Oz, along with fellow council member and Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker, were in violation of the Biden administration's policy of federal candidates serving on presidential boards.
author: Heather Hamilton
title: WATCH: Dr. Oz responds to Bidens request that he resign from fitness council

sentence: Oz, best known as the host of The Dr. Oz Show, and Herschel Walker were both sent letters on Wednesday asking them to resign by the end of the day or they would be terminated, a White House official told NBC News.
author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Dr. Oz Calls Biden 'Petty' After Being Asked to Quit President's Council

sentence: RESIGNATIONS SOUGHT - President Biden requested two members of the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition, Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz, who were appointed by former President Trump, either step down or face termination amid their U.S. Senate runs in Georgia and Pennsylvania.
title: Biden demands Dr. Oz, Herschel Walker resign; The spies among us -- one former spy speaks out

sentence: President Joe Biden's administration sent letters to television personality Dr. Mehmet Oz and former NFL player Herschel Walker Wednesday, asking them to resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition or be terminated by the end of the day.

title: Biden asked Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from a presidential council or be terminated

sentence: Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker speaks at a rally featuring former President Donald Trump in Perry, Ga., on Sept. 25.Sean Rayford / Getty Images file Earlier Wednesday, the White House announced plans to name the chef Jos Andrs and the WNBA player Elena Delle Donne as co-chairs of the presidential council, of which Walker has been the chair and Oz has been a member.
title: White House moves to oust Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker from presidential advisory panel

sentence: A similar notification was issued to Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker, who is running for the Senate in Georgia.
title: Biden demands Dr. Oz, Herschel Walker step down amid Senate runs

sentence: President Joe Biden informed Republican Senate candidates Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker that they needed to resign from the Presidents Council on Sports, Fitness and Nutrition or they would be removed.

title: Biden forces out Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker from fitness council

sentence: President Biden formally asked two Trump-appointed members of the Presidents Council on Sports, Fitness and Nutrition Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz to resign or else be fired, citing administration policy that bars candidates for federal office to serve on presidential boards.

title: Biden tells Herschel Walker, Dr. Oz to resign from presidential fitness board

sentence: Just as President Joe Biden has reportedly asked GOP Senate candidates Herschel Walker and Mehmet Oz to resign their posts on the Presidents Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition, Biden has announced his intent to appoint their replacements.

title: Biden moves to oust GOP Senate candidates Herschel Walker, Dr. Oz for Jos Andrs, Elena Delle Donne

sentence: The White House has removed Dr. Mehmet Oz best known as daytime TVs host of The Dr. Oz Show and former football star Herschel Walker from the Presidents Council on Sports, Nutrition and Fitness as both men run for U.S. Senate.
